description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including variables for colors and various class-based styles for game components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container for the application, centered in the viewport with a flex layout.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: A container for the game area with padding and shadow effects.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styles for the title of the game with text shadow and color properties.

classes.name: mode-button
classes.description: Button styles for selecting game modes, including transitions and hover effects.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Style for displaying the game status with color adjustments.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Grid layout for the Tic Tac Toe squares.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Style for each square on the game board with responsive size and hover effects.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Style for the button that resets the game with hover effects.
